Params: {3: 'Liv picks up the stack of cards inside the box and notices a note sticking at the back.'}
{3: '"Go home and stay with your partner on this rare night of Valentine\'s Day! Use this present well. That\'s the most I can do for you!"'}
{3: 'Liv stops saying it out loud after a few words, and her cheek burns red after reading the note.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "C-Commandant... Being a p-partner might be... It's just that I'm hoping to focus on our mission before the fight is over...", 4: '1'}
{2: '(Explain where the mystery box comes from)', 3: '13'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Phew... So you didn\'t know what was inside the box either. "Anything I Want"... I don\'t think I want anything aside from help on our mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Not to mention that I find it... difficult to ask someone to do something I can do just with a card.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Would you say no if someone you care about asks you to do something simple together?', 3: '18'}
{2: 'How would you feel about that, then?', 3: '21'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "If it's someone I care about... I'd feel glad to be needed.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You are not sure what kind of scenario Liv is thinking about, but you see a faint smile on her face as she answers you.'}
{2: 'I think the people you care about would love to be needed in the same way.', 3: '25'}
{3: 'Her eyes sparkle under the starlight. Determined, she slowly takes out one of the cards and hands it to you.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'In that case, can I ask you to walk me back to the Gray Raven lounge, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
